author: protolambda
content:
```
  --data-dir="/data"
  --web3-url=wss:// some address here
  --bootstrap-file="/data/custom_bootnodes.txt"
  --udp-port=9000
  --tcp-port=9000
  --listen-address=0.0.0.0
  --nat="extip:{{public_ip_address}}"
  --log-level="DEBUG"
  --deposit-contract=0xA15554BF93a052669B511ae29EA21f3581677ac5
  --state-snapshot="/root/genesis.ssz"
  --rpc --rpc-port=4000 --rpc-address=127.0.0.1
```
Is what I use to run nimbus currently. And in a docker image I built, adapted from the thing in the repo, but on my own branch with api fixes (before it was merged) and pulling in build data to not redo the complete build.
